    • getOpponent

      public MatchMakingDTO getOpponent​(MatchMakingDTO playerNetworkInfo)
      Thread safe method that finds opponent for multiplayer level. If no opponent is found, requesting player is placed to queue.
      Parameters:
      playerNetworkInfo - Network information of the requesting player where player and userName fields are populated by the caller.
      Returns:
      Opponent data if found, else null.
